SEARCH
Package FOH

Class EditReservation

java.lang.Object
FOH.EditReservation
public class EditReservation extends Object
The EditReservation class manages the user interface for editing existing reservations within the FOH Service Software. It allows for updating details of a previously created reservation, including customer information and reservation specifics like date, time, and table selection.

  • Constructor Details

    • EditReservation

      public EditReservation(int selectedBookingID, boolean isWalkInSelected, String selectedPrefix, String selectedForename, String selectedSurname, String selectedTelephone, net.sourceforge.jdatepicker.impl.UtilDateModel selectedDateModel, String selectedTime, Integer selectedOccupants, String selectedTableNo)
      Constructs a new EditReservation instance. Initialises all UI components with data from the existing reservation.
      Parameters:
      selectedBookingID - The ID of the booking to edit.
      isWalkInSelected - Whether the reservation was marked as walk-in.
      selectedPrefix - The prefix of the customer.
      selectedForename - The forename of the customer.
      selectedSurname - The surname of the customer.
      selectedTelephone - The phone number of the customer.
      selectedDateModel - The date model representing the reservation date.
      selectedTime - The reservation time.
      selectedOccupants - The number of occupants for the reservation.
      selectedTableNo - The table numbers associated with the reservation.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start() throws IOException
      Initialises and displays the reservation editing interface. Configures the main frame, adds components to the panel, and makes the frame visible.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the setup.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle()
      Configures the title properties and adds it to the top region of the main panel.

    • addField

      public void addField(JPanel panel, FlowLayout layout, String label, JTextField field)
      Adds a labeled text field to the specified panel with the given layout.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel to which the field is added.
      layout - The layout for the field.
      label - The label for the field.
      field - The text field to be added.

    • addDropDown

      public void addDropDown(JPanel panel, FlowLayout layout, String label, JComboBox<String> dropBox)
      Adds a labeled drop-down list to the specified panel with the given layout.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel to which the drop-down list is added.
      layout - The layout for the drop-down list.
      label - The label for the drop-down list.
      dropBox - The drop-down list to be added.

    • setForm

      public void setForm()
      Configures the form components including walk-in checkbox, prefix drop-down list, text fields, date picker, time selector, occupants field, and table number field.

    • loadButtons

      public void loadButtons()
      Configures and adds submit, cancel, and table selector buttons to the interface.

    • updateBooking

      public void updateBooking(Connection conn) throws SQLException, IOException
      Updates the booking in the database using JDBC. This includes modifying customer details, reservation times, and associated table numbers.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is a problem executing the SQL query.
      IOException - if there is an I/O problem during the operation.
